item.title: ‘Barbie’ production designer reveals the movie used so much pink paint on set that it caused an international shortage.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: PinkPantheress will release ‘angel’ from #Barbie on Friday, June 9th.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Olivia Rodrigo will officially release new music on June 30th, according to new countdown.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: The song served as the lead single off her fourth album ‘Bangerz’ and is certified 5x Platinum in the US. It became a #1 hit in the UK, peaked at #2 on Billboard Hot 100, and was named the best song of 2013 by Billboard.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: 10 years ago today, Miley Cyrus released ‘We Can’t Stop.’
item.author: PopBase

item.title: The acclaimed track topped the Billboard Hot 100 for 9 weeks and is certified Diamond in the US. It went on to win Song Of The Year at the Grammys and is hailed as one of the most influential pop songs of the decade.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: 10 years ago today, Lorde released her debut single ‘Royals.’
item.author: PopBase
